languages.text: "Просто кто-то слишком мало старался и не слушал своего старшого. Или это у вас кто знакомый умер, и надо посочувствовать?" {n}Равор кряхтит и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Странный у вас выбор собеседника для такого дела, Лорд-капитан".

"Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Просто кто-то слишком мало старался и не слушал своего старшого. Или это у вас кто знакомый умер, и надо посочувствовать?" {n}Равор кряхтит и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Странный у вас выбор собеседника для такого дела, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Someone didn't try very hard and didn't listen to their higher-up, is all. Or has someone you knew died on you and I'm s'posed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to talk to 'bout something like that, Lord Captain."

"Someone didn't try very hard and didn't listen to their higher-up, is all. Or has someone you knew died on you and I'm s'posed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to talk to 'bout something like that, Lord Captain."

"Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm s'posed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

"Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm s'posed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

"Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

"Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Soit ils ont pas fait d'efforts, soit ils ont pas écouté les ordres, c'est tout. Ou c'est parce que quelqu'un que vous connaissez est mort, et vous vous attendez à ce que je vous présente mes condoléances ? » {n}Ravor grogne et détourne le regard.{/n} « C'est pas franchement à moi qu'il faut s'adresser pour ce genre de choses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Soit ils ont pas fait d'efforts, soit ils ont pas écouté les ordres, c'est tout. Ou c'est parce que quelqu'un que vous connaissez est mort, et vous vous attendez à ce que je vous présente mes condoléances ? » {n}Ravor grogne et détourne le regard.{/n} « C'est pas franchement à moi qu'il faut s'adresser pour ce genre de choses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Será que no le pusieron suficientes ganas o que no escucharon a sus superiores. ¿O es que ha muerto alguien que conocía y tengo que darle el pésame?». {n}Ravor gruñe y aparta la mirada.{/n} «No soy la persona más indicada para estos asuntos, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Será que no le pusieron suficientes ganas o que no escucharon a sus superiores. ¿O es que ha muerto alguien que conocía y tengo que darle el pésame?». {n}Ravor gruñe y aparta la mirada.{/n} «No soy la persona más indicada para estos asuntos, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: “因为有些人不够努力，或者因为他们不肯服从上级的命令，就是这样。噢，是不是你认识的人死了，我应该表达一下同情才对？”{n}雷沃哼了一声，移开了目光。{/n}“居然找我这样的人谈这种事情，船长老大，你这思路还真够清奇的。”
languages.original_text: "Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “因为有些人不够努力，或者因为他们不肯服从上级的命令，就是这样。噢，是不是你认识的人死了，我应该表达一下同情才对？”{n}雷沃哼了一声，移开了目光。{/n}“居然找我这样的人谈这种事情，船长老大，你这思路还真够清奇的。”

languages.text: 「その何人かは努力が足りなかったか、上の言うことを聞かなかったか、それだけのことです。それとも、あなたの知り合いがあなたのために死んだとに、私がお悔やみを言わなければならないんでしょうか？」{n}ラヴォアはうめき、目をそらした。 {/n}「そのようなことを私に話されるとは、奇妙な人選ですね、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「その何人かは努力が足りなかったか、上の言うことを聞かなかったか、それだけのことです。それとも、あなたの知り合いがあなたのために死んだとに、私がお悔やみを言わなければならないんでしょうか？」{n}ラヴォールは呻き、目をそらした。 {/n}「そのようなことを言うとは、奇妙ですね、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Die haben sich nur nicht genug angestrengt oder nicht auf ihre Vorgesetzten gehört, das ist alles. Oder ist jemand gestorben, den Ihr kennt, und ich soll Euch mein Beileid aussprechen?" {n}Ravor grunzt und blickt weg.{/n} "Damit hättet Ihr zu jemand besser Geeignetem gehen können, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Die haben sich nur nicht genug angestrengt oder nicht auf ihre Vorgesetzten gehört, das ist alles. Oder ist jemand gestorben, den Ihr kennt, und ich soll Euch mein Beileid aussprechen?" {n}Ravor grunzt und blickt weg.{/n} "Damit hättet Ihr zu jemand besser Geeignetem gehen können, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Çünkü o bazıları, ya çok çabalamıyorlar ya da üstlerini dinlemiyorlar da ondan. Yoksa sorumluluğunuz altında birisi öldü de baş sağlığı dilememi mi bekliyorsunuz?" {n}Ravor, homurdanarak bakışlarını çeviriyor.{/n} "Böyle bir hususta konuşacak insan seçiminiz de bir garip Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Those some weren't trying hard enough or listening to their higher-ups, is all. Or has someone you know died on you and I'm supposed to offer my sympathies?" {n}Ravor grunts and looks away.{/n} "Odd choice of person to come to with something like that, Lord Captain."
